metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7607 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The handle_gnu_hash function in readelf.c in elfutils 0.168 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4').
